snippet.title: Rosen's Brigade for the Atari 8-bit family
snippet.description:
Came also out for:

???


Game description:

Rosen's Brigade is a shoot'em-up, where you have to shoot down hostile planes, tanks, and catch paratroopers before they end up in the water.


What I think:

This game got some slack, but I honestly don't think it is that bad. Actually, it is not bad at all...just absolutely repetitive and easy. 

Gameplay-wise this game handles quite well.
